When all the economic and other

I feel strongly about it because at

13.58.text:

24.98.text:

56.75.text:

There are many men in the world today in

64.94.text:

82.48.text:

Nobody has power of that kind. The

97.45.text:

99.94.text:
Now the Canadians, who are relatively
small on the northern frontiers of the

105.01.text:

108.43.text:
States years ago. We have struggled and

113.29.text:

119.56.text:

124.78.text:
box, to dismiss a Labour government and

129.19.text:

in our society that I believe will
destroy all that is most valuable in

140.35.text:
Britain. I want to work and cooperate

143.44.text: myself and that's the key to it all.

149.09.text:
democracy, you see, I want to cooperate and

no international organization which we

191.18.text: The people of Bristol have sent me

And every time they've had the power to

203.53.text: of that I've had to listen to them.

Now the Commissioners don't have to

209.05.text:
they are immune from the possibility of

214.36.text:
the traditions of democracy are
different from ours. Thirty years ago

218.89.text:
Germany was under Hitler, Italy under

223.87.text: revolutions and counter-revolutions and coup d'états. We for many centuries have

229.78.text:

234.04.text:
Now, nobody can pretend, least of all you,
because I know you have an idea of a
